code: import users from"../../data/user_list.json";var getUserData=function getUserData(){var i=0;var searchUser=[];users['users'].forEach(function(user){var container=require("../../data/users/".concat(user,".json"));var changeName=function changeName(container){return!container?"":container;};var changePrim=function changePrim(container){return!container?"":container.pattern;};var changePhone=function changePhone(container){return!container?"":container.name;};searchUser.push([{key:i,type:"id",data:changeName(container.resources[0].data.userid)},{key:i,type:"name",data:changeName(container.resources[0].data.displayName)},{key:i,type:"primary",data:changePrim(container.resources[0].data.primaryExtension)},{key:i,type:"department",data:changeName(container.resources[0].data.title)},{key:i,type:"device",data:changePhone(container.resources[0].data.Phone[0])},{key:i,type:"location",data:container.resources[0].meta.hierarchy.split("_").pop().toLowerCase()}]);});return searchUser;};export default getUserData();
